PresentationTable.name: Base Facts
PresentationTable.Description: This folder contains Target Fact Metrics with different types of aggregations.

PresentationColumn.name: Target Revenue
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Target Revenue from the Target Facts table, with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Target Quantity
PresentationColumn.Description: Returns the Target Quantity from the Target Facts table with a Sum aggregation

PresentationColumn.name: Target Unit Price
PresentationColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Target Unit Price by dividing Target Revenue by Target Units.

PresentationColumn.name: Target Completion (Rev Pct)
PresentationColumn.Description: Calculates the completion percentage by dividing Actual revenue by Target Revenue. The result is then multiplied by 100.

PresentationColumn.name: Actual Unit Price
PresentationColumn.Description: This logical object calculates the Actua Unit Price by dividing Revenue by Units.
